column5: The modern newly remodeled in 2017 “Sea Vista” Beachfront Condo offers 2 Bedrooms, (Sleeps up to 6)   2 Bedrooms (1-King Bed, 2-Full Beds) Beachfront Balcony, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Washer and Dryer Central Air Conditioner 3 LCD HDTV’ Broadband Internet and Wi-Fi throughout 2 Resort Pools, 2 Hot Tub and 2 Tennis Courts Private Beach Access, Gulf and Oceanfront Views Gated Entry and Elevator
column8: Owner's Special Newly Remodeled Beachfront Condo
